name: File Grabber
description:
I did this from around 9:40 PM to 12:40 PM, so this was made at night, after a long day, on very little sleep. Fun. My amazing musical and artistic talent make this game... lacking in some ways but hey it's fine. This was made for the 3x3 Hours game jam, and yeah. Hope you enjoy it!

Story:

Oh noes the eevil sunik pirate bandit people have stolen your files. So the obviouse solutuon is to go into your computer and get them back yourself.
